heading: Fun & Educational Events
text: We host workshops that are aimed at all levels of photographers, whether you're just getting started or you're a seasoned pro. We also host regular Fotocrawls around the city and other areas.

heading: Yearly Photobook Issue
text: Each year we release a photobook that showcases the best photos taken by our members. This is a great way to get your work published and seen by others. Last year's theme was 'Wild'.

heading: Photography Discounts
text: We have partnered up with John Gunn Camera Shop in Dublin to provide all DCU Fotosoc members with a 10% discount on development, scanning and printing services.
